p: By comparing the prevailing HCV variants between PWID and individuals who acquired the infection sexually, the same subtypes were only identified in Australia [ 13, 27]. Some similarities were also noted in India (subtype 1a) [ 21], Indonesia (genotype 3) [ 22], Japan (genotype 2) [ 23] and Pakistan (genotype 3) [ 24, 27] (TableÂ 3).
